 "The Rev. Ted Haggard emerged from three weeks of intensive counseling convinced he is "completely heterosexual" and told an oversight board that his sexual contact with men was limited to his accuser."
 Ok, something just doesn't add up here. Why would he have had sexual encounters with a man (over 3 years, apparently) if he were completely heterosexual? I think he's either fooling himself, lying, or delusional. It sounds like he's simply trying to tell some evangelicals what they want to hear.
